column4: Hi, I'm having a bit of trouble making a USB boot drive for Netbook Remix.
I'm trying to create it on a Mac using the commands listed at https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Installation/FromImgFiles
however the download is a .iso file and the drive won't boot when plugged into an eeepc 701
i had similar issues with my 701, try changing the USB drive
also did you use unetbootin utility to write the ISO to the USB ?
unetbootin is available for the Mac? let's see if I can use it
